notificationMessages.cannotShareUserInfoWithServer_RefreshPag: An unexpected error occurred while trying to communicate with extension's server. Could you refresh the page please?
notificationMessages.operationErrorRefresh: An error occurred during operation. Please refresh the page and try again

returnPoints.title: Don't give the points back to owner

giveWarning.title: Delete selected contents with a warning

question.title: Remove the points received by the respondents when they answered the question

moderating.contentAuthorIsModerator:
"%{content_author}" has moderation powers.
Please moderate this from the panel
moderating.contentAuthorHasSpecialRanks:
"%{content_author}" has "%{special_rank}" rank and might be someone who's important.
Please moderate this from the panel

personalNote.title: You can add a personal private note here and that will relate only to this user

pointsWithExample.title:
You can add points by typing positive numbers like 123
or
you can remove points by typing negative numbers like -123

notificationMessages.cannotFindUser: I couldn't find the user with the entered ID number
notificationMessages.idNumberRequired: You need to enter an ID number
notificationMessages.openABrainlyPage: You need to open a Brainly page in your browser
notificationMessages.preparingUnsuccessful: An error occurred while preparing the delete reasons and fetching from Brainly
notificationMessages.noEvidenceFound: Moderator didn't add any evidence nor comment
notificationMessages.doYouWannaGiveThisPrivilege: Do you want to give this privilege to all extension users?
notificationMessages.doYouWannaRevokeThisPrivilege: Do you want to revoke this privilege from all extension users?
notificationMessages.privilegeHasGiven: Privilege has been given to %{user_amount} users
notificationMessages.privilegeHasRevoked: Privilege has been revoked from %{user_amount} users
notificationMessages.incorrectData:
I can't communicate with %{market_domain_name}

Please visit any page from %{market_domain_name} or refresh the page that is already open

createShortLinkButton.title: Create a short link for this web page

themeColor.title: Theme Color
themeColor.colorFormatInfo: You can set theme color with Hex color codes. I mean, you need to set #FF0000 for the red color

quickDeleteButtons.title: You can set deletion reasons of the quick delete buttons
quickDeleteButtons.question: Question

extendMessagesLayout.title: This option will extend the layout of the messages page. You can try it when the messages page is open.

notifier.title: Extension will toast a notification you when you have a new message or new notification on Brainly

users.title: You can set the extension user's permission and privileges
users.addNewOrEditUser: Add a new or edit extension user
users.hasntUsed: User hasn't used the extension yet

explainingColors.line1: Some users have colored border in their avatars and this colors shows their access permission status of the extension.
explainingColors.line2: <s>Red</s> border means that shown user is banned from the extension.
explainingColors.line3: <s>Mustard</s> border means that the user has the permission to use the extension but hasn't started to use it yet
explainingColors.line4: <s>Green</s> color means the user is an active authorized user.
explainingColors.line5: <s>No border</s> means that user has some privileges assigned but not the permission to use the extension in their account and hasn't started to use the extension yet.

0.title: Extension admin
0.description: Can use the extension without any restriction. (No need to assign any other privileges, this will remove all restrictions)

1.title: Quick delete questions
1.description: On the pages of questions, archive mod and homepage, user can use the quick delete buttons for deleting the questions

2.title: Quick delete answers
2.description: On the pages of questions, archive mod and homepage, user can use the quick delete buttons for deleting the answers

4.title: Announcement management
4.description: Can create, edit, remove or publish the internal extension announcements

5.title: Manage extension users
5.description: Can add or edit the extension users and give them privileges or permission to use the extension

6.title: Verify answers by selecting
6.description: On the user contents page, the moderator can verify answers by selecting 25 answers max- on each page

7.title: Mass-Content deleter
7.description: In the moderation panel, user can use this function for deleting multiple questions/answers/comments from Brainly

8.title: Group messages
8.description: In the messages page, user can send private messages to multiple users in a group at once

9.title: Mass-Message sender
9.description: In the moderation panel, user can use this function for sending a private message to all users of your market

10.title: Supervisors page, Message sender
10.description: In the supervisors page, user can send a private message to listed moderators or all moderators of your market

11.title: Deletion reasons preferences management
11.description: Can set warning level of deletion reasons

12.title: User deletion reports
12.description: In the extension options, user can see account deletion reports

13.title: Mass-Point changer
13.description: In the moderation panel, user can change user's points by their IDs

14.title: Selective question deletion
14.description: On the user contents and question searching page, user can use the selective deletion function to delete selected questions

15.title: Selective answer deletion
15.description: On the user contents page, user can use the selective deletion function to delete selected answers

16.title: Selective comment deletion
16.description: On the user contents page, user can use the selective deletion function to delete selected comments

17.title: Reported comments deleter
17.description: User can use this function to delete all the reported comments from Moderate all

18.title: Mass-Moderate reported contents
18.description: User can use this tool to mass-moderate reported contents from the Reported contents page

19.title: Selective ask for correction
19.description: On the user contents page, user can use the selective ask for correction to report answers

21.title: View users' privileges
21.description: User can see extension privileges of other extension user's that has been assigned to their profiles, without making any changes

22.title: Can change access permission
22.description: User can manage permissions to use the extension

23.title: Can change important privilege
23.description: User can assign/revoke important privileges to other extension users

24.title: Can change less important privilege
24.description: User can assign/revoke less important privileges to extension users

25.title: Can change harmless privilege
25.description: User can assign/revoke harmless privileges to other extension users

26.title: Selective question deletion(Multiple pages)
26.description: On the question searching page, user can use the selective deletion function to delete selected questions from multiple pages at once

27.title: Mass-Manage users
27.description: User can use this function to manage users massively. Like, changing a list of users points or approve answers of users or etc.

28.title: Action history reviewer
28.description: Ability to review other moderators' actions to be marked as valid or invalid and letting them know about their mistakes from moderator actions history page

45.title: Quick delete comments
45.description: On the pages of questions and archive mod, user can use the quick delete buttons for deleting the comments

29.title: Mass-Moderate contents
29.description: User can use this function to moderate contents massively

30.title: Verify all answers
30.description: User can use this function to approve all answers of users massively by providing list of ids/links of users

31.title: Delete users
31.description: User can use this function to delete users massively by providing list of ids/links of users

32.title: Change points
32.description: User can use this function to change points of users massively by providing list of ids/links of users

33.title: Change ranks
33.description: User can use this function to change ranks of users massively by providing list of ids/links of users

36.title: Content delete options on profile page
36.description: Allow this moderator to see the links used to delete all questions, answers, and comments from profile page of a user

37.title: Moderate Panel > Delete all comments
37.description: Ability to delete comments in bulk from the moderate panel

38.title: Confirm reported answer button
38.description: Allow moderator to use the confirm button to confirm/accept reported answers instead of verifying

39.title: Action history, review management
39.description: Ability to revert other reviewers' reviews on moderation history of moderators. Without this, reviewers can only revert their own reviews

98.title: Limited channel access on Discord
98.description: User will not see any channels other than the #announcements and #rules channels on the Discord server

40.title: Unverify answers by selecting
40.description: On the user contents page, the moderator can unverify answers by selecting 25 answers max- on each page

DeleteReasonsPreferences.withoutAsk: Give warning without asking for confirmation
DeleteReasonsPreferences.withAsk: Show confirmation dialog box while deleting a content

explaining.line1: You can find deletion reasons by typing the name of the reason
explaining.line2: After selecting one from the results, you can click %{exclamation-circle} button to give warning without asking for confirmation from moderators while they are deleting a content. But in some cases, that can change and moderators should decide if giving a warning is necessary or not. So you can click %{exclamation-triangle} to show confirmation dialog to moderators while they are deleting a content.

notificationMessages.cantFetchDeleteReasons: An unexpected error occurred while trying to prepare deletion reasons
notificationMessages.extensionServerError: An unexpected error occurred while connecting to the extension server. Please try again in ~5 sec.
notificationMessages.ifErrorPersists: If this error persists, please contact the extension manager and explain what happened :)

You are not authorized to use the Brainly Tools.

 Are you triple times sure?

notificationMessages.couldntAbleToGetNoticeBoardContent: I couldn't get the content of the notice board

MassContentDeleter.containerExplanation: You need to put content links or ID(s) to text box line by line. Each line should contain 1 ID number

MessageSender.information: This function can send your message to the users by counting backwards from the given id number. Once you've started the process and you want to send a message to the ID numbers, you have to wait and not close this page(this includes your computer as well) till the process finishes.
MessageSender.somethingWentWrongWhileLoadingModerators: Something went wrong while fetching details of moderators

announcements.title: Once you've read the announcement, you need to mark it as read

pointChanger.enterOrPasteUID: Enter or paste user profile ID
pointChanger.youNeedToEnterOrPaste: You need to enter user ID or you can paste copied list of user ID(s) into input
pointChanger.pastingExample2: Also, you can specify the points in the list before copy pasting
pointChanger.pointsNotSpecified: You must give points to at least 1 user in order to proceed

reportedCommentsDeleter.description: You can delete all reported comments in Moderate All with one click. You just need to start and keep this tab open. That's all.

questionAnswerReports.title: Click here to see reported questions and answers

commentReports.title: Click here to see reported comments

correctionReports.title: Click here to view the answers that have been reported for correction and are waiting to be moderated

lazyQueue.description:
This option enables lazy loading for the reported contents queue.

When enabled, the queue displays report boxes with a delay while scrolling through reports, so it's memory-friendly.
However, the "Find on page" feature will not function for invisible reports. The page might display empty reports while scrolling too fast

toggleInfiniteLoader.description: Turn on/off auto-loading contents on scrolling the page

loadLimiter.description:
This option allows you to increase/decrease the limit of how many report box will be shown after clicking the load more button.

Higher values may cause a little delay in showing boxes

exportReports.nothingToExport: There is no report left to export

queue.pageNumberInputTitle: Enter a page number between %{MIN_N} and %{MAX_N}

I'll try to fetch all reported contents from Brainly but the process can be interrupted by Brainly because of elevated requests.
